paragraphs.body: Bureaucrats are the highest tier of Avatar Wiki users, with the additional ability of being able to change user rights. On Avatar Wiki, all bureaucrats are also ${link_0}.
paragraphs.text: Bureaucrats are the highest tier of Avatar Wiki users, with the additional ability of being able to change user rights. On Avatar Wiki, all bureaucrats are also administrators.

paragraphs.body: Bureaucrats oversee and supervise all requests for user rights, and carry out the community's decision in the case of nominations for administratorship or nominations for bureaucratship.
paragraphs.text: Bureaucrats oversee and supervise all requests for user rights, and carry out the community's decision in the case of nominations for administratorship or nominations for bureaucratship.

paragraphs.body: Bureaucrats also must at their discretion accept or decline user requests for rollback. This is done according to their judgment. However, the wider community can also have input into this decision by asking the requesting user questions about whether they need and deserve rollback.
paragraphs.text: Bureaucrats also must at their discretion accept or decline user requests for rollback. This is done according to their judgment. However, the wider community can also have input into this decision by asking the requesting user questions about whether they need and deserve rollback.

paragraphs.body: New bureaucrats can be made through a voting procedure at ${link_0}. The candidate should be an experienced and trusted administrator.
paragraphs.text: New bureaucrats can be made through a voting procedure at nominations for bureaucratship. The candidate should be an experienced and trusted administrator.
